website_summaries.verdict: A fun 1-rider towable tube that shows little wear even after multiple seasons of use.
pros: Lasts through multiple seasons with little wear and tear showing
cons: Smaller than expected, with a lower weight limit
Can be a rough ride because attachment point location is very low

customer_reviews.title: Split review
customer_reviews.text: I'm torn in this review. We took the tubes out and they worked great; we like them. However, the product description clearly states that the boston valve was included with the purchase of the tube. Only one of the three came with a valve. I had to run to the store last minute to try and find some. In my mind that's false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Major Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Tubes are of decent quality. Biggest problem is the location of the strap on the tube to connect the rope. It is located so low that at anything other than WOT and 20+mph the rope hits the water and sprays right in the eyes of the rider. My boys were done with these and won't ride them again. I tried different inflation levels of the tubes, different ways of hooking the rope onto it with no lick. I have no idea why it is located in the middle. Maybe this is a way to sell their ball that goes on to the rope to keep it out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Zim5

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a lake trip we were going to in Michigan. I was highly impressed. You only need a hand pump to blow it up. My kids 9 & 8 rode inside it and on top. We also had adults riding on it aging from 40-72. It was wonderful you can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mtngirl

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to abuse
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, Holds up to abuse, The kids love it. One tip: Use only with a high quality "Air-Head" tube tow rope. We made the mistake of first using a ski rope. It snapped and almost hurt one of the kids. These tubes must put a lot more drag on the rope than one on water skis. I wish it had a built in gauge of some type to show when it is properly inflated.
customer_reviews.author: ASC2078

customer_reviews.title: DEATH TRAP!!!! DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: ON THE FIRST TRIP OUT OUR SON GOT HIS LEG CAUGHT BETWEEN THE TUBE COVER AND THE BOTTOM OF THE TUBE. HE COULDN'T GET FREE. AS HE STRUGGLED HE TURNED THE TUBE OVER. LUCKILY, WE SAW HIM STRUGGLING. WE SLOWED DOWN AND IT RELEASED THE TENSION ENOUGH THAT HE GOT HIS LEG FREE. IT COULD HAVE DROWNED HIM OR AT LEAST HURT HIS LEG. TERRIBLE DESIGN
customer_reviews.author: mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Only buy the tubes that are fully encapsulated with a full cover, unlike this type.
customer_reviews.text: One of the seams on the plastic tube got a small hole after only a few times of use and it was with a 110# girl on it. These plastic tubes are not designed to have such pressure from the ridge of a cover that does not fully encapsulate the inner tube. Both tubes like this now have the same problem, unlike the fully encapsulated tube that has lasted over 2 years with zero problems (pressure is distributed equally with the fully covered tubes).
customer_reviews.author: handygal6204

customer_reviews.title: Leaks air! Split on the seams!
customer_reviews.text: Our very first time we tried to blow up the tube, there was a leak & the air kept deflating out of it. It has been too long since we ordered it & now can’t return them. We are very unhappy. Additionally, we ordered replacement bladders which one poped immediately and neither came with the valve to blow them up. Not sure what has happened to this company, as the originals I purchased three years ago were awesome, and now there are garbage quality.
customer_reviews.author: Naturelife

customer_reviews.title: Great tube for one rider.
customer_reviews.text: The teens loved this tube! Had a blast for days on the lake. Don't get the quick connect plastic piece, it drags in the water and sprays the rider in the face!
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tubes
customer_reviews.text: Nice tubes. We bought 2 to replace some that had worn out and they were great fun. I was concerned that they would seem small but they seem to be the standard size. They work fine for kids or adults.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie C

customer_reviews.title: Fun on the water
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to be towed by a wave runner. We had a great day on the lake but when. It came time to deflate the inside tube spun a bit inside the clothe holder. This made it difficult to pull the plug to let the air out. Eventually I was able to get my hand by the plug but the valve broke. Pliers had to be used to get the final plug out. Amazon exchanged the tube so I have a new one in the box to try again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Szorc

customer_reviews.title: A good product for the price and I will buy it ...
customer_reviews.text: A good product for the price and I will buy it again when needed. This is the second season we have used it and it is holding up well but does have a couple of bulges of the top. I assume the plastic is thinner in these areas but does not affect the performance. However, you will need to use the tow rope in reverse (handle in boat). If you don't water constantly shoots in the riders face.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: Holding up very well have beat the hell out of it and it just keeps going. Used it probably 3-5 times this summer all day long and holding up great even over loaded with me on it at 290lbs. Tons of fun love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Corea

customer_reviews.title: Used it all summer..no problems
customer_reviews.text: Was the cheapest one I could find at the time. So I was expecting not much. But after using it all summer, I expect this thing will last for a few more years easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bigbellied1

customer_reviews.title: Great 1 person tube
customer_reviews.text: Looks good inflation is a breeze and so is deflation. Holds 1 person great. However don't try 2 people.. Not even kids just get a 2 person tube. It's not meant for that :)
customer_reviews.author: William Martin

customer_reviews.title: Purchased two and had everyone in the family enjoy them - ages from 10 - 50
customer_reviews.text: Worked really for us. Arrived in the morning and were on the lake in the afternoon. Purchased two and had everyone in the family enjoy them - ages from 10 - 50. Really easy to fill and deflate. They dried quickly and fold up very nice and small for storage. Can't beat them for the price
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Great tube for the price
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the teens and small adults. Needed another tube in a hurry and the price was right. Definitely work the value and it is a great addition to our boat and toys. Recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Weight Capacity is Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can use this as a 2 person rider or just 1. We have taken it out many times. Material holds up against the sun. An it holds up to 250 pounds in weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walls

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and had a blast with my son. Very sturdy and reliable. Be aware it is only a one person tube. It is not big enough for two.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great tube for the kids. We bought this so the little ones could ride.
customer_reviews.author: RegAly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Hold Shape
customer_reviews.text: We had this out for a three day weekend and the kids really enjoyed it. Left it inflated and in the boat while in storage and when we went to use it two weeks later, I added a little air to top it off and found the tube completely misshapen. It is bulging out of the cover and creasing. Was happy with the purchase initially, but now I'm not sure it's even usable any more.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Saves gas in my boat.
customer_reviews.text: It is more exciting than my other towable because it goes all over the place so it saves me gas because I don’t have to tow it as fast as my other towable.
customer_reviews.author: David Honadle

customer_reviews.title: Small but good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good value for the price, but it is very very small. If you're taller than 5', this is probably not the tube for you. Good for kids, and it seems to be holding up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Samwell

customer_reviews.title: nice value
customer_reviews.text: bought this tube as our last one was worn out. had a blast at the lake with it and i would recommend buying one.
customer_reviews.author: j walker

customer_reviews.title: Great tube
customer_reviews.text: Great tube, my friends and I who are all 250 and up to 6'6" used it all weekend. It is a bit small though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good! However, it was only used one day.
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice deflate feature. Seems to be well made!
customer_reviews.author: rollingfast

customer_reviews.title: Not for adults
customer_reviews.text: Not for adults.... Very uncomfortable and can’t support an adult. We returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Bonham

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tube in December and was just able to use it yesterday. I was hoping for a refund but the window has closed. Straight out of the box it began losing air. Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for younger kids!
customer_reviews.text: Not a good tube for little kids under the age of 7-8 years old. We had a few kids get their legs stuck in the tube. Within 30 minutes we had 6 kids crying to get out. Maybe older kids would like it. Seemed to be nice quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great tube!
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered for the kids for the 4th of July and it was a hit. It looks like good quality and I am hoping like other buyers that it will last for a few years of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Don't
customer_reviews.text: Hole is deep bit diameter is very small. Cover is rough. Not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Towable and lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Glad to report that this did in fact last the summer season and held together! I had my doubts at first as the outside liner seems to be a little wimpy. Hopefully it will last another season as well!
customer_reviews.author: David J. Drummond

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great quality! Outside of the inflatable tube is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable and great quality! Outside of the inflatable tube is a wrap made of heavy cloth, which protects it from damage when approaching shore. It was used countless times this year, and undoubtedly will last for several more!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie D.

customer_reviews.title: He loved it, and we were pleased that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 yr old grandson to use on the lake at camp. He loved it, and we were pleased that it is so well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: deborah e mower

customer_reviews.title: Airhead blast  float (towable)
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for grandchildren. They had lots of fun . Item good quality and as described. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Terry

customer_reviews.title: Air valve gone during first use.
customer_reviews.text: Had this on boat for a few months decided to use. Mostly use bigger tube. After 1 use fill valve came out while in use. To late to send back, so garbage it went.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: It’s so much fun ridding on my stomach your feet get a massage in the water I love being on my stomach and trying it all different ways trying to do tricks and stuff
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great Heavy Duty Product
customer_reviews.text: Waited until end of summer to write a review of this product just in case...and I can definitely say that it is a durable tube. We used it every weekend all summer long with 5 kids and 4 adults. It held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a single rider... fun for everyone (100-250 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Ripped quick
customer_reviews.text: The Cover over the tube ripped after one use. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Towed a 54 pound 7 year old fine with our Merc 3.0
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't feel as durable as the 2 person O'brien tube we have but my son said it was much easier to ride this one as your rear end sits down in it. Towed a 54 pound 7 year old fine with our Merc 3.0.
customer_reviews.author: cruz878

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Moderate cost plus very durable. Perfect for our weeks vacation and cheaper than renting. Just make sure you have the valve tightly secured after inflating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 and one wouldn't stay inflated out of box ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and one wouldn't stay inflated out of box. Bought in December as Christmas present, didn't open/inflate til May, which is past return perid (I assume since there is no option showing on Amazon account. VERY DISAPPOINTING!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Beaman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this tube! It is of good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Debra B

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Good size for kids, kind of deep in middle not comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kristine. C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have used this all summer with our boat. Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: michelle p warren

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Kids love the new tube and it works great behind the boat!
customer_reviews.author: CLovin

customer_reviews.title: A great entry level tube
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for pulling myself and buddies around the lake. Handled speed very well when paired with the airhead pulley harness.
customer_reviews.author: James Bondarenko

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but do not think it will last long. Could be a little heavier duty.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great Float!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat it. We didn't tow with it, just anchored it in to the ocean. Kids had a blast with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat DiCrecchio

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Works great, deffinently a 1 person though two people are extremely difficult.
customer_reviews.author: jeff l.

customer_reviews.title: Tore in half
customer_reviews.text: Used for literally 2 minutes for the first time and the liner tore in half at the seams. Didn't even go over 30 mph.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas newton

customer_reviews.title: No Kwik-Connect included...
customer_reviews.text: The tube is good and seems like it will work fine. My dismay is with the lack of included Kwik-Connect. Multiple places in the ad state the kwik-connect is included and it is not.
customer_reviews.author: iXplore

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the nylon sleeve tore away from the sleeve and ripped the sleeve beyond repair. We had only used this tube 6-8 times. Not a durable item.
customer_reviews.author: sondra hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a float especially when water is a tad too cold. It's a bit difficult to get onto directly from water even if one is in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: TommyT

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger children.
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great for smaller kids but for adults really needed cover on both sides. Didn’t realize it was open on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Karen G. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kit for the price is awesome! Everything's worked great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Vincens G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grand kids had lots of fun with them. They held the air nicely.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Is just as described. Held up to 190lb man being towed. Great fun for the kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for the great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great product and everyone enjoyed! That’s what it’s about.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great one person tube.
customer_reviews.text: Great one person tube. We used it all weekend with out any issues
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun, good price
customer_reviews.text: Second of these tubes, lots of fun, good price, I store mine out of the sun when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: ABLEFOOT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love this tube. So much fun, they are small enough they can sit inside it to ride.
customer_reviews.author: lmfrakes

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be exactly as advertised. It is a tube, you can ride on it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for younger kids. Recommend for the price. Tough construction
customer_reviews.author: Johnny H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and in good condition. Our grandchildren had a blast with it. Great price. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa in TN

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to blow up
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids are loving it. Big enough for 3 pre-schoolers or 2 grade school aged kids. Seems well made and durable. Quick and easy to blow up. If it came with a storage bag I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Held up well on the lake. No problems all weekend
customer_reviews.author: Laila Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Description says that it comes with the Kiwk connect, it does not.
customer_reviews.author: swordscurse

customer_reviews.title: Good small one person tube
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids/teens. A bit on the small side for most adults
customer_reviews.author: JEFF DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect and a good deal
customer_reviews.text: We used this when renting a boat with our kids. It was perfect and a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: kimmi

customer_reviews.title: It took a beating and stayed fully inflated for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: There were no CONs on the tube. Great value and the kids had a ball!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Pulled with an old Seadoo
customer_reviews.text: Fit full grown men in excess of 200lbs. We had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: They don't water ski or wake board so wanted something for them to have fun on. This fits the bill and they had ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids coming for a visit. They don't water ski or wake board so wanted something for them to have fun on. This fits the bill and they had a blast. Saw these locally, used for more money so think this was a good buy. Arrived on time and in perfect condition. Used heavily for a week and no problems. We did have a large foot pump to use to fill with air. Very good value
customer_reviews.author: Islandgal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its ok but not great. A little small and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great value! It airs up and deflates quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great value! It airs up and deflates quickly. Most of all, the kids love it. I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Grimdiver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just as I thought it would be and fun for everyone thanks Jeff
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Will give rug burn on your knees!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had a blast on this tube until she got off of it and realized she had terrible rug burn on her knees. I think this tube may be more appropriate for adults who can put their butt in the middle vs. putting your knees in the middle. Just an FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ATENTION
customer_reviews.text: An amazing tube that perfect and safe however keep in mind that the adapter used to inflate it is not included so you may want to think about buying that'd
customer_reviews.author: Lori McInerny

customer_reviews.title: Tube
customer_reviews.text: A little small for two people... only one is best
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality but center hole was kind off small and they sit up high in water.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Good and Durable just what you need for the river!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: This intertube is too small for its casing. IT works, but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Prunckle

customer_reviews.title: Durable and exciting!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these and I am completely satisfied! They are durable and my children and grandchildren love riding them.
customer_reviews.author: 7stillwater

customer_reviews.title: Be more specific if the type
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a rip off tha ugh it said lay down tube doesn’t specify lay down or sit down tube
customer_reviews.author: Christi Hartman

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved it as well as my 5 and 7 year ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it as well as my 5 and 7 year kids did! Would suggest it to my friends
customer_reviews.author: tammy spell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tubes were smaller than i thought but work get to use behind a pontoon or jetski!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fun and seem durable after few trips to lake and beach.
customer_reviews.author: pltvu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Top notch product. We are a family that sees tubes as a consumable with how hard we are on them. These hold up just as well as some of the better known ski suppliers brands and are less than half the price. Handles are comfy and strong. These do ride a bit higher in the water so take a little more skill (yes I said skill :) ) when tubing.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wanichek

customer_reviews.title: Our kids love this tube
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love this tube. The only downside is there is some splash - we may add the booster ball at some point. But they just wear goggles and all is good. We've only had it for one season, but so far it seems to be a good tube for the price point. We also purchased the kwik connect to go with it and the AHTR-22 tow line.
customer_reviews.author: W. W. J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You should only be informed that you need the valve to fill.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Nice tube, but not gentle on legs.
customer_reviews.text: I have three children using this tube and 2 of them are teenagers. While tubing, their legs get caught up underneath the tube somehow when they're sitting on their knees inside of the tube. I had them lay on the tube instead...and they were much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kayla manor

customer_reviews.title: Good kids' tube
customer_reviews.text: Good low cost tube for pulling the kids around but the plastic is a lighter weight so I don't think it will hold up long to the heavy beating I like to have as an adult rider. The handles are also too far back from the front so they are just uncomfortable both sitting and laying on the tube. The kids like the bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tube for the price. Definitely 1 person and follow weight limit. We had 170 lb dad and 40 lb 9 yr old and tube was too deep in water. We are towing behind performance pontoon and it works great. Also very visible on the water. We had correct rope for tubing - this is vital and tube does not come with the rope.
customer_reviews.author: Delaware gal

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: construction is ok quality for pool but not for aggressive lake towing
customer_reviews.author: james stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our vacation this past summer and it worked great to tow our grandkids ranging in age from 3-17. No problems with it at all. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Grandma

customer_reviews.title: It would be perfect for casual
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is of the cheaper quality, we have been tubing for years and the material gave us "rug burns" on our arms and legs. It would be perfect for casual, tow behind the slow boat definitely not for extreme tubers that go over waves.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for smaller riders or guys that want a little challenge to hold on to
customer_reviews.author: trevor bean

customer_reviews.title: We had a great time and pleased with how well it is made
customer_reviews.text: We had a great time and pleased with how well it is made. We plan to use it for many summers.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia jordan

customer_reviews.title: Would buy another!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal. Great price compared to the other tubes and it works awesome. Highly recommend, used it got people up to 200 pounds, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Junior Pena

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the kids. They are teenagers but new to the sport and they are having a blast.
customer_reviews.author: JB

product_meta.title: Airhead Blast | 1-4 Rider Towable Tube for Boating
feature_bullets: Kwik-Connect - Airhead's patented Kwik-Connect for quick and easy rope connection
Partially Covered - Heavy-duty partial nylon cover
Speed Safety Valve - For fast and easy inflating and deflating
Padded Handles - Non-slip cushioned handles providing comfort and stability

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
